name.japanese: サラサラの実 モデル:アホロートル
name.romanized: Sara Sara no Mi, Moderu: Ahōrōtoru

abilities.name: Axolotl Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into an axolotl or axolotl hybrid form. In Smiley's case, the poisonous slime mass could take the shape of a giant axolotl.
abilities.visualDescription: Smiley takes the form of a massive axolotl with eyes, mouth, legs, caudal fin, and external gills.

abilities.name: Sentience Granting
abilities.description: The Devil Fruit gave sentience and life to the otherwise inanimate mass of poisonous gas, allowing it to move and act with purpose.
abilities.visualDescription: The poison gas mass became a living creature capable of independent action and response.

keyMoments.title: Smiley Uses Axolotl Form in Combat
keyMoments.description: Smiley takes its axolotl form and attacks Zoro, Sanji, Brook, and Kin'emon with massive poisonous blob attacks, forcing them to flee.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Devil Fruit's combat application when combined with the poisonous nature of Smiley's body.

weaknesses.description: User cannot swim and is weakened by Seastone and standing water.
Smiley specifically avoided water as it would disperse the gas composition of its body.

trivia.fact: The Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl is notable for being the first Devil Fruit shown to be reborn after the user's death, reforming in a nearby apple in Episode 602.

sources.title: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: This is the only known case of a Devil Fruit being fed to a non-living substance (poisonous gas) to grant it life.
